response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $1,200,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an advantageous price of $1,100,000. This special offer is designed to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1100000}
